column4: Are there any Instant Message programs that can support webcam through the AIM protocal ?
i'd just use the OS for now, get used to it
gyache isnt in the software manager. should i aptitude for it?
gyache isnt in the software manager. should i aptitude for it?
its not ni the repo but there are repos for it, or you can compile
well if im a newbie at this, i wont even attempt to compilelol
http://www.ubuntugeek.com/how-to-install-gyachi-in-ubuntu-9-10-karmic.html   has a directory for Lucid too
no, a ppa is a 3rd party repo
you can install apps off of a ppa using aptitude
I got it all except: sudo apt-get install gyachi (result: couldnt find package gyachi)
did you run: sudo apt-get update
ok but before i begin. will it work for AIM the webcam?
aim, i thought you said yahoo. not sure about aim
